~~arithmetic~~
addition
   -1 + -1     = -2
   -1 + 5      =  4
subtraction
   -1 - 1      = -2
   -1 - (-1)   =  0
multiplication
   -1 * -1     =  1
   -1 *  1     = -1
division
   -1 / -1     =  1
    1 / -1     = -1
